name: Simonbreak
tagline: Memory game, based on "simon says" game, developed with React.js
body:
## Welcome to Mind Break
Mind Break is a game based on "Simon Says" game, the purpose of this code is learn React.js. Version 1.0 include 4 different levels, variations of the original game. Code and game experience will be improved in future versions. 

### Libraries
Underscore 1.8, React 0.3.13, Jquery 1.11, in the future gulp and nodeJs will be implemented.

![Mind Break](http://i.imgur.com/qQiJbBG.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
